item.title: Will The Modern Planet Of The Apes Movies Ever Introduce Time Travel?
item.description: The Planet of the Apes franchise is built on time travel, but will the more grounded modern-day reboot series ever utilize that plot point?

item.title: Where To Watch Den Of Thieves 2: Pantera - Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.description: Gerard Butler and O'Shea Jackson Jr. return for Den of Thieves' sequel. Here's where you can watch Den of Thieves 2: Pantera in theaters or at home.

item.title: The Batman 2 Director Matt Reeves Addresses Recent Release Date Delay And Offers Positive Update: "This Next Year Is About ... Getting The Movie Going"
item.description: Following the reveal that The Batman 2 has been delayed to 2027, director Matt Reeves gives a new and positive update to the delay for the DC sequel.
